audio_capturer.h
================

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`MultiMedia_AudioCapturer <multimedia_audiocapturer.md>`__

**Description:**

Provides the **AudioCapturer** class to implement operations related to
audio capture.
